message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $95. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $90, which I feel is a fair price considering the value it offers.
I'm getting close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
